tags.cf-questions: A little bit about myself: I'm currently a senior at the University of Michigan majoring in Computer Science.&&In my free time I love to learn more about CS concepts, surf, play video games and take photos, specifically film photos!&&You can view my film photos on Flickr.&&You can also see all my open-source projects on GitHub.&&If you would like to talk to me, whenever I find my way out of this website, my email is chrisvensand@gmail.com
